name: Southern Trail
description: The path leads out of the woods into an open plain. The road continues uphill, winding up out of sight. An earthen fort guards the eastern side of the path.

buildings.name: Earth Hall
buildings.description: The fort is confusing, full of dead ends and short staircases that lead back to where they begin. At the very center is a massive sphere of dirt, floating above an alchemical pool.

name: Route 7
description: The route leads up into the hills. At the peak you take in the view. The hills quickly descend into a shrubby plain, beyond which is an endless desert.

name: Desert's Mouth
description: A small building sits at the side of the road. You can both hear and smell the camels living in the pen behind the building. The desert lies just ahead of the single sign of civilization.

buildings.name: Camelpalooza
buildings.description: You enter building to find a number of camels for sale. You can buy one and ride it to cross the desert.

name: Bunkten's Crossing
description: You reach an intersection in the middle of the desert wasteland. It's pure sand and shrubs as far as the eye can see. A giant sign is posted into the ground.

name: Abandoned Shack
description: The road fades into the desert landscape as you arrive at a small shack. The door swings open in the dusty wind.

buildings.name: Fire Hall
buildings.description: The shack houses a set of stairs to an underground bunker. The bunker is very warm for being so deep below the surface. A bright flame illuminates the path forward. The central room of the complex houses a pillar of fire, in front of which is an alchemical pool.

name: Oasis
description: A large pool of water supports a number of trees here. To the south you see another mountain range.
actions: Chop trees:Lignum Vitae Logs,Mesquite Logs,Birch Logs
conversionActions: Draw water:Bucket of Water:Empty Bucket:You begin drawing water from the oasis.

name: Leupp
description: A small village resides in the wastes. A dried up creek bed runs past the edge of town.

buildings.name: Public Oven
buildings.description: You enter the public oven. You can bake bread here, if you have the dough.

buildings.name: Artisan Guild Woodworks
buildings.description: The building seems quite new. Workers are taking the harvested lumber from the village and packing it up for transport.

name: North Leupp
description: A sturdy fence surrounds the northern half of the city. A lumberjack supply store has been built into part of the wall. A guard stands watch at the gate.
